comments.body: Do we want the test fixes in a separate PR? That's helpful if we want to backport these test fixes separate from the addition of FreeBSD 13.

These changes are only useful if the addition of FreeBSD 13 is backported anyway. This setup role basically just has a bunch of distro-and-version-specific file includes, so when we bump FreeBSD, we need to update it. It's been that way the [last](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/commit/4357a78130d84785720750d3d6801db5cf4df464) few [times](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/commit/11b7091c84ed6cf9576f319118b88f2a81894764) I've updated freebsd as well.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@  pip: # no package in pkg, just use pip
    name: paramiko
    extra_args: "-c {{ remote_constraints }}"
